data.meaning: adj. 慢的、迟钝的、不活跃的

app_sentences.en: The old man is walking very slow along the quiet river.
app_sentences.cn: 那位老人在宁静的河边走得很慢。

app_sentences.en: I feel very happy whenever I play with my best friends.
app_sentences.cn: 每当我与最好的朋友一起玩耍时，我都感到非常快乐。

app_sentences.en: A large ship is sailing on the ocean towards the next city.
app_sentences.cn: 一艘大船正行驶在大洋上前往下一个城市。
